metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16126 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An Ubuntu-specific modification to AccountsService in versions before 0.6.55-0ubuntu13.2, among other earlier versions, improperly dropped the ruid, allowing untrusted users to send signals to AccountService, thus stopping it from handling D-Bus messages in a timely fashion.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This vulnerability is in an Ubuntu-specific patch and doesn't affect the upstream code.

criterions.comment: accountsservice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
